text: Stephen Arthur Stills (born January 3, 1945) is an American singer and songwriter. He is most famous as a member of the groups Buffalo Springfield and Crosby, Stills & Nash. In 2003, Rolling Stone listed him at #28 on a list of the "100 Greatest Guitarists of All Time".Rolling Stone Magazine The 100 Greatest Guitarists of All Time ==References== Category:Singer-songwriters from Texas Category:Singers from Dallas Category:Writers from Dallas Category:1945 births Category:Living people
title: Stephen Stills
